name: Real
author: joaovti
description: Com este cog consegue verificar o valor do Real Brasileiro para outras moedas, para obter comandos disponiveis utilize [p]help | With this Cog, you can check the Brazilian Real value compared to other currencies, to get available commands use [p]help
install_msg: Utilize o [p]help para ver os comandos disponiveis | Use [p]help to check all available commands (Moedas disponiveis/Available currencies: ARS, JPY, CNY, GBP, EUR, ETH, BTC, USD)
